Bigos

"Counter-Strike Never Die."

Memorable and fun to play no matter how old this game is.

"A game initiation teacher for generations"
 This is the beginning of the life of countless young FPS games, and it is also the childhood in the hearts of countless people. It has been popular all over the world and is a model of the game industry that is imitated and even copied by subsequent games.  This game has been destined to be extraordinary since it was released. Countless servers have been turned on and off, and countless modules have been made and updated. Today it is still alive, living in an abandoned USB flash drive, living in someone‚Äôs memory  Here, live the word of mouth from old players to new players.
 Ten years ago, that ignorant boy first met with it, so he was fortunate enough to travel to every quiet corner of the desert and hear the melodious sound of Italian street corners. Ten years later, his school uniform was changed into a suit, and the years climbed up to his face, but when he double-clicked the black and white icon and returned here, he was still the brave boy back then.
 And it will never change.

 An eternal monument should not be judged.

Well, to be honest I recommend this game to everyone who's wondering if it is worth buying. The Answer is YES. It's a Classic and It's still enjoyable even after these years, there are lots of players in this game and there are lots of mods to play. You can even play cs go modes if your PC can not support CS:GO. I hope you found this review helpfully. Have a Nice Day

Es un juego muy divertido para jugar con los amigos y demas personas a pesar de los a√±os todavia me impresiona la cantidad de gente que lo juega y sobre todo la comunidad activa que tiene, lo recomiendo el precio del juego es barato

con mis 800 horas puedo decir que es un buen juego (con mucha variedad de modailidades si sabes buscar) y con muchos servidores llenos de gente con la que te cagas de risa, a pesar de lo simple que puede parecer este juego me dio muchas emociones lindas y tanto diversion como frustracion. ademas de la gran variedad de modos de juego, hay una gran variedad de configuraciones.

advertencias antes de jugar el juego:

1) mirate algun que otro tutorial de como jugar y practica con bots (ya que si entras a un servidor no vas a hacer mas que perder tiempo, segun mi experiencia)

2) no te frustres si perdes mucho, de todo se aprende y de cada error sale algo mejor.

3) una ves creas que jugas bien (porque seamos sinceros que vos creas que jugas bien no significa que lo hagas) mirate algunos tutoriales de configuraciones asi mejoras tu rendimiento dentro de el juego.

y nada eso es todo lo que se me ocurrio, el juego es buenisimo y lo que mas se necesita es paciencia. muy recomendado
Incredibly populated even to this day. Strongly reccomended for those seeking an escape from skins and tryhard-ism.
